subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Howie Garfinkel’s life in basketball — whether it be as a scout, a coach, a summer camp creator or a director of basketball clinics — will be honored Sunday.
snippet: Howie Garfinkel’s life in basketball — whether it be as a scout, a coach, a summer camp creator or a director of basketball clinics — will be honored Sunday.
